inline.testData:
Payload will land in channel as defined in webhook on Mattermost:
{"attachments":[{"fallback": "fallback text", "image_url":"https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/10/10/22/24/wide-format-2839089_960_720.jpg"}]}

{"channel": "off-topic", "username": "new_username", "attachments":[{"fallback": "fallback text", "image_url":"https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/10/10/22/24/wide-format-2839089_960_720.jpg"}], "icon_url": "http://www.mattermost.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/icon_WS.png"}
inline.expectedResult:
• Webapp and RN show the image correctly
  • Fallback text should not be visible
  • There is no extra white space in the attachment when the attachment has no title
